utilities.tools

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.tools.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends Object
    This class holds one static method for logging exceptions in the file "log.txt" (which is created at the top of the classpath).

      static boolean log(String errorType, String errorMsg, Exception e, boolean exceptionMsgOnly)

    • Method Detail

      • log

        public static boolean log(String errorType,
          String errorMsg,
          Exception e,
          boolean exceptionMsgOnly)
        This method logs the given Exception (which can be null) together with the time and message in the file specified by Logger.FILEPATH.
        Parameters:
        errorType - - A String saying what kind of error occurred (example "WRITE ERROR"). A set of standard messages can be found as constants in this class.
        errorMsg - - The message to be displayed after the error type.
        e - - An Exception (can be null), from which additional information of the error will be taken.
        exceptionMsgOnly - - If only the Exception's message should be written, and not the entire stack trace.
        Returns:
        True if the message was successfully logged, false otherwise.
